vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
UpgradeabilityStorage._version (UpgradeabilityStorage.sol#12) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- version (UpgradeabilityStorage.sol#21-23)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
UpgradeabilityStorage._implementation (UpgradeabilityStorage.sol#15) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- implementation (UpgradeabilityStorage.sol#29-31)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
UpgradeabilityStorage._implementation should be constant (UpgradeabilityStorage.sol#15)
UpgradeabilityStorage._version should be constant (UpgradeabilityStorage.sol#12)
